genetic_algorithm.component

Interface Substitution_Algorithm

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Substitution_Elitism, Substitution_GenerationalReplacement

    public interface Substitution_Algorithm
    Apply the substitution process to produce a new generation. "Ersetzungsschema", "survival of the fittest"
    Author:
    Wolfgang Bongartz

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Generation apply(java.util.ArrayList<Individual> children, java.util.ArrayList<Pair> parents, Generation currentGeneration) 
      int computeNumberOfChildren(int generationSize)
      Computes how many children are needed to apply the substitution algorithm.

      • computeNumberOfChildren

        int computeNumberOfChildren(int generationSize)
        Computes how many children are needed to apply the substitution algorithm. Depends on how many individuals from the current generation should become part of the next generation.
        Parameters:
        get_generationSize -
        Returns:
